errors.error_description: Installation commands are in incorrect order - pip install is executed before cloning the repository and changing to the directory
correction_candidates:
git clone https://github.com/neurogym/neurogym.git
    cd neurogym
    pip install -e .

pip install -e .
    git clone https://github.com/neurogym/neurogym.git
    cd neurogym

cd neurogym
    git clone https://github.com/neurogym/neurogym.git
    pip install -e .

git clone https://github.com/neurogym/neurogym.git
    pip install -e .
    cd neurogym
errors.golden_answer:
git clone https://github.com/neurogym/neurogym.git
    cd neurogym
    pip install -e .

errors.error_description: The full install command references 'last command' but the previous commands are now in wrong order
